text: Leisuretowne is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) located within Southampton Township, in Burlington County, New Jersey, United States.State of New Jersey Census Designated Places - BVP20 - Data as of January 1, 2020, United States Census Bureau. Accessed December 1, 2022. As of the 2020 United States Census, the CDP's population was 3,842. == References == Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey Category:Census- designated places in New Jersey
title: Leisuretowne, New Jersey
